data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
SDP::Generator is the Perl interface to SinisterSdp's SDP_Generator
    C library. It implements an XML::Writer'ish interface to dynamically
    and programmatically generate an SDP session description. The
    generated description can either stored in a scalar or saved to a
    file.

    I plan on writing a pure-Perl version of the library as a drop in
    replacement for this XS-bybrid.
